brief: Sets amplitude, add and pan position with one method.
name: set()
description: Sets amplitude, add and pan position with one method.

parameters.name: amp
parameters.description: the amplitude of the noise as a value from 0.0 (complete silence) to 1.0 (full volume)

parameters.name: add
parameters.description: offset the output of the noise by given value

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: pan the generator in stereo panorama. Allowed values are between -1.0 and 1.0.
